annotations.description: Thanks to Bespoke Post for sponsoring this video. New subscribers get 20% off their first box by using my code 20CHEM: https://bspk.me/chem3 Here are five de...
annotations.title: The 5 Easiest TEQUILA Cocktails

textContent:
2 oz (60ml) blanco tequila
1 oz (30ml) fresh lime juice
1/2 oz (15ml) agave nectar

Rim a glass with chili salt or Tajin (optional)
Combine all ingredients into a shaker tin with ice
Shake and then double strain over a rocks glass with ice

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aLwBI_i6MQw
title: Tommy's Margarita
